CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 13, 1945, pg. 1, reads: "Sworn In - Col. George E. A. Fairley, Director of Public Safety, is shown here as he swore in Fifth Ward Constable Robert E. Williams as a city detective, and Mrs. Miretta Morris of 6 Trent Street, as a policewoman, on Monday. Mrs. Morris was formerly matron at the Centre Avenue police station. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Director of Public Safety Col. George Fairley swearing in police officer Miretta Morris and detective Robert E. "Pappy" Williams, in office
